entry.title: CTV + CSFS: a letter
entry.summary: The email emphasizes the significance of relay changes in the context of future Layer 2 (L2) designs within the Bitcoin network, specifically pointing out their importance for projects like Ark. For Ark to function as a non-custodial L2 solution where unilateral withdrawals are feasible, it must possess capabilities to circumvent transaction pinning effectively. Moreover, it should offer flexibility in paying transaction fees, mirroring or exceeding the functionality provided by the Lightning Network. The discussion includes a reference to [Peter Todd's website](https://petertodd.org) for further information or context related to these technical challenges and solutions in Bitcoin development. This conversation is part of an ongoing dialogue among experts contributing to the Bitcoin Development Mailing List, indicating the collaborative effort towards improving Bitcoin's infrastructure and its scalability solutions.
